website_summaries.verdict: With optimal cushioning, impressive traction and high breathability, Adidas Powerblaze has earned many fans in the market ever since its launch. The Powerblaze running shoes are ideal for neutral runners looking for advanced gripping properties and high breathability in a shoe.
pros: Most customers thought the Adidas Powerblaze was very comfortable
one such person commented that the shoes felt nice, even after ten hours of wearing them
The majority of people mentioned how these shoes had a fairly good energy return
A few runners liked how these shoes fit around their feet—it was neither too tight, nor too loose
A few purchasers also appreciated the light weight of these shoes
A runner highlighted that the shoes had good traction properties and were perfect for running on wet pavements
A distance runner commented how the Powerblaze had the right kind of heel cushioning
A user said that his feet remained comfortably cool and dry during his runs and workouts
The aesthetic looks of this shoe gained positive remarks
cons: A person with high arches commented that the shoes did not provide sufficient side support
he also felt his feet sliding on the padded insole
A purchaser reported that some parts of the Adidas Powerblaze had started to wear off after only a few months of use
A user felt excessive chafing against his heel

customer_reviews.title: Soles unglue themselves
customer_reviews.text: My last pair of Adidas were spectacularly made but have started looking like a well worn but sorta maintained homeless man. The soles of these shoes have unglued themselves. It started on the edges of those stupid white fins. Keeps messing with my feet b/c you feel like you're stepping on stuff as the sole folds under itself. I am very disappointed with this shoe from a manufacturing perspective. I got them because they were blue and Adidas. Clearly and unfortunately these were put together by small children in the back of pickup with a (cheap) hot glue gun. Will follow up with a photo.
customer_reviews.author: J. Butler

customer_reviews.title: Worst pair of shoes I've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: I've bought three of these pairs of shoes throughout the years based on the recommendation of a podiatrist. These last pair of shoes have changed to the point they must be Chinese knockoffs. The size it too small despite the other two pairs being the same size and fitting well. The material that is on the soles last two days. Two days! I barely walked 5 miles total on the sidewalk and they fell apart from the shoe. Never again Adidas, put that CrossFit money your spending and make a better shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn007

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart the first time I wore them
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit well and I typically like Adidas shoes. These were a valentine's gift from my wife but they turned out to be very disappointing. The first time i tried them on I went out to go coach baseball. As soon as I stepped from my car I knew something was wrong. On both shoes, the bottom layers peeled from the shoes and were flapping in the wind. Eventually, the pieces just fell off. I am returning these shoes and I will probably never buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: The Nelsons

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made!!
customer_reviews.text: Terribly made shoe! After about 3 wearings (no runs, only to the gym) a rubber tread on the sole of one of the shoes broke loose. Put them aside for a while. Recently decided to get some gorilla glue and fix it. Did that two days ago. Today I wore them to the gym (again, no stress due to running, what they are made for) and multiple rubber treads have come loose - just from walking!! Cheaply made. Not worth the purchase no matter the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Treds coming off with less than 30 minutes of wear.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my little brother for Christmas. Were shipped and received in a timely manner as advertised. New-in-box. Gave the shoes to my brother Nov 30, Saturday. He wanted to wear them for a local Christmas 5K. Completed the run, and inspected the shoes after. In less than 30 minutes of wear, on smooth surfaces, at low-intensity running, with zero cutting or quick changes in direction.... Majority of the tred are already coming off... which will require me to epoxy them back on. Awesome. A great quality purchase (slight sarcasm). (Background: 13+ years experience track/trail running and selecting appropriate multi-surface footwear for leisure/military; not a novice.)
customer_reviews.author: Cody Lee Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not durable
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last as long as I think it should. This should have lasted longer than the year. But after about 11months of intermittent use( once or twice a week) it started unsticking at the soles. Everytime I fix one part another part seems to give. I usually buy addidas because they normally stand up better than that. I'm hoping this was just a bad one and not the standard to expect from them now.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J.

customer_reviews.title: Adidas Men's Powerblaze Running Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have only had them for a short time, but they fit great, not wide like some shoes. They are very light with a fantastic gripping tread, perfect for walking in the rain or wet pavement.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Fontneau

customer_reviews.title: Smdh ... adidas... name but not adidas quality
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected, it runs a little small like adidas usually does, but in the pictures I thought it had some mesh overlay. Turned out to be drawn on lines. They feel very cheap and light, but that could be a good thing if that helps you when running, etc... the foam bottom has no weight to it, they look ok from afar just don't let anyone close enough to see how cheesy these really are...
customer_reviews.author: Josh n Family

customer_reviews.title: I love ADIDAS but.......
customer_reviews.text: I usually purchase and wear ADIDAS exclusively but found these particular models to be lacking in quality. This model has a two piece construction sole which failed, broke apart within a few months of wear. I am not a runner and only wore these shoes in dry weather and exclusively for walking while working my landscaping business.
customer_reviews.author: william wheeler

customer_reviews.title: The size is about right, but the toe box ...
customer_reviews.text: The size is about right, but the toe box is a little narrow. I use these for everyday shoes, including a 1-1/2 mile walk every morning, but they are NOT holding up The black rubber on toe and heel has come loose (1 toe, both heels) and I had to glue them back on. Goop works very well for this- it was called shoe goo when it first came out about 1980. I shouldn't have to repair shoes that only get light use and are only 3 months old.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas B.

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes. Didn't even need a "break-in" period. Great support. I got these for walking, jogging, and running. As with most new shoes in an impact sport, you would expect a break-in time and blisters on your feet. Not these. Tried them on and was able to run immediately with no aches or pains. Extremely comfortable, and they look real sharp too. I ordered a size 12 in mens. Most brands I wear between 11-12, and these fit perfectly at the 12. Perfect width, lots of support, and I could wear them all day without a problem. So far they seem pretty durable and will last me sometime. Not a single complaint!
customer_reviews.author: Darko

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: Such a waste of money the rubber peeled off after the first time wearing them and my first time was riding a bike peddling ive glued them with shoe glue wearing them a few more time still falling apart need to throw them away
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly disappointed in this shoe. Wore them once. Executed a powerful HIIT treadmill workout. Went to put them on the following day and found the sole separating on both shoes. I know my middling athleticism and 185lbs did not cause the destruction. Have not experienced this with adidas shoes in the past. Wonder if supplier is selling shoes that did not pass quality control.
customer_reviews.author: peter

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes - Color is neon
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes to go to the gym a do cardio basically, they are a second skin! Not only the shoes fit perfectly, they provide very good support and are very fresh, ventilation works like a charm. The shoes are practically weightless, so I am very happy with the purchase. The only downside for them is the color. Pictures show them as orange, but it is actually neon orange. ODK if I would have bought the shoes if I saw the real color, but on everything else, I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN DE GOES

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe...but wont last long
customer_reviews.text: Sending back my second pair, always the same issue: glue is weak and it starts coming apart. Others having the same issue, would be a great running show otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: George Nevis

customer_reviews.title: FEEL CHEATED.........REALLY DIDN'T EXPECT THIS
customer_reviews.text: I really did not expect this.....gave a 5 star on my previous post I guess.....and I take it back now I received this on 15th of July 2015 and use it below moderate. It's not even 3 months and my shoes are showing signs of wear on the mesh. Moreover the shoe is smaller than size said as mentioned by others....you know as a rule they say have a thumb gap from the tip of the shoe to the tip of your thumb, for best fit, well it didn't happen for me with this product and I wear the size I bought... Anyways I have attached pics for you guys to judge yourself.
customer_reviews.author: RAQUEEB

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, feels awful.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, feels awful. Very bizarre feeling when you put them on. Like they didn't put the inner soles in the shoe (they did, we could see them). This is not a minimalist shoe, the sole is just as thick as it looks in the picture. But it felt weird, like walking on rocks. I did a few laps around the house and both feet were instantly in pain on the soles. Not sure if it was a defective pair, but not replacing with same shoe though. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Crockett

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and breathes well, fits as expected.
customer_reviews.text: For what I paid for these I can't complain. They're actually quite comfortable minus some arch support but I do have to say my arches are pretty damn tall. They breathe very well too! Very important when it's hot and humid outside. I generally wear a 12 but ordered mine larger as I feel I needed more room for my toes and these worked out great in this regard. So if you can order them a 1/2 size larger it might be a good idea.
customer_reviews.author: Wado Potato

customer_reviews.title: JDK-Quality Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Sole on the bottom I have had to glue on several occasions...I do not wear very often, so based on the use which is casual I am disappointed with the quality here.-JDK
customer_reviews.author: JDK71

customer_reviews.title: I really like adidas shoes
customer_reviews.text: I really like adidas shoes. But these were cheap shoes. Parts of the soles started falling off my sons shoes in the first month. I have never had that happen before. It's really hard to find a decent shoe for boys in the 6-8.5 range. Especially shoes that are supportive. So it is very disappointing when the brand I usually trust to be decent falls apart and it made of the same cheap material as other cheap shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad tread wear.
customer_reviews.text: Shoe looks great, fits great, but the one issue, the tread soles fall off in the first day you get them, my buddy had the same problem. If you order just keep superglue handy in your car... wouldn’t recommend a long run in these but kicking around at a friends or going to the grocery store they’re great... pic is after gorilla gluing the crap out of them at a bar.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, I normally use 11.5 and they fit a little small, nothing major but a little samall
customer_reviews.author: Tanichy11

customer_reviews.title: the shoe was great when I first got it
customer_reviews.text: the shoe was great when I first got it, but after 6 months I started to notice that they shoes started to smell. Apparently the material of the shoe retains your sweat and odor becomes an issue. I have replaced the original inserts with special odor eating ones and still doesn't seem to help. If the material breathed more then I would of given it a 4 star review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat this shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! But I have to say buy half to full size larger. Adidas for me always run small. Otherwise what a great shoe. Light and very comfortable and the color is just great!
customer_reviews.author: dave k.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding performance super light excellent color combinations overall 5 out of 5 no lie...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect in every way brand, color, style, I gotta be on my feet over 7 out of 8 hours on my daily shift with these shoes I don't feel tired because they are well built they are meant for running but for the amount of miles I put on them walking around I cover an average of 7 -10 miles on any given day...very glad I got them seriously considering getting a second pair!!!
customer_reviews.author: D1&ONLY

customer_reviews.title: Great light weight shoe with a nice comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.text: Great light weight shoe with a nice comfortable fit. This is my second pair, and my first lasted a long, long time before breaking down. I've been a runner all my life, and a fan of adidas for most of it. This is a great shoe for the price.
customer_reviews.author: goetzdesign

customer_reviews.title: I like em
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these shoes. They're super comfortable & lightweight. The color is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: jmcd

customer_reviews.title: The red (or other color) rubber pieces that stick to ...
customer_reviews.text: The red (or other color) rubber pieces that stick to the bottom on the soles soon become loose, and they eventually fall apart. Adidas really need to re-design these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: great comfortable & light shoes.
customer_reviews.text: glad i went half a size bigger based on reviews. it fits good. item stated its black, but its actually a navy blue(u can zoom in pic & see for yourself). i'm unexpectanly surprise in a good way. shoe is comfortable & light, kinda narrow tho. i do 12 hr shifts on my feet at a hospital. i always been a nike customer. after this first pair of addidas, i will definately consider shoes from addidas in the future.
customer_reviews.author: A. Pham

customer_reviews.title: This has been a great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My son wears his shoes hard and these have lasted quite a few months....no tears or holes yet. He wears them most of the day, and has had no foot/ache issues. This has been a great purchase! We put fleet feet inserts in them, and know that helps with the overall fitting/feel of the shoe. This is our 2nd pair :D
customer_reviews.author: P. Austin

customer_reviews.title: Just a great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is absolutely a workhorse! Will take a good beating in the sense it has served me well without coming apart. I got a good pair and it has lasted me several years.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob David

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: classy and comfy perfect for running, walking, or weight lifting They breathe so well too, although avoid the puddles if you can! All that air flow means water can get in too Overall, I would definitely buy these again. Adidas is always coming through.
customer_reviews.author: roxbury124

customer_reviews.title: The shoe was good, I enjoyed the fell and look
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fell apart after about 6 months. The shoe was good, I enjoyed the fell and look. But then I notice in some spots the glue was coming lose. The sole at the toes just came apart.Really bummed about it too.
customer_reviews.author: jamall n austin

customer_reviews.title: 2 pair in this style fell apart
customer_reviews.text: We sent back the 1st pair because we thought it was a fluke that the bottom was falling apart after 3 days. The second pair lasted a little longer but now the bottom is falling off that pair too. Mild wear and tear. About 10K steps a day in those shoes, nothing excessive. My husband and I very much love adidias. I just dont understand why this particular shoe is made so poorly.
customer_reviews.author: H. Hutchison

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Style
customer_reviews.text: Please bring these back! Need size 13 in every color. Miss these badly. If you find a size that fits I strongly recommend these shoes for the gym, running, and being outdoors. They are lightweight, breathable, and extremely comfortable. I have bought 3 pairs but I cannot find them in my size anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The black soles on these shoes keeps coming loose and ...
customer_reviews.text: The black soles on these shoes keeps coming loose and I have to keep gluing them back on. Typically do not have this problem with adidas
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Beaven

customer_reviews.title: Not meant for long runs
customer_reviews.text: I'm a marathon runner that likes a running shoe that I can wear normally as well. While these look nice, they're just not great for runs longer than a few miles. It's uncomfortable and feels rigid. I thought I try adidas running for once, but it was not successful. I'll have to stick to asics/nike for now.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit, Bad Sole
customer_reviews.text: Pros - fit is great, use them for trail walking, very comfortable, bottom has a nice great springy feel and traction Cons - find a better quality of shoe string and replace the sole with some gels and you are good, the sole that comes with it adds nothing and is just hard and you feel it within first few steps
customer_reviews.author: Patrick W.

customer_reviews.title: Adidas: always good quality, fit well, and last long.
customer_reviews.text: Adidas is always my go-to shoes. I've worn many different Adidas shoes over the years because they always fit well, don't look over-the-top like most new shoes, and last a long time. My previous pair was a set of Under Armour brand shoes which made me regret not buying these earlier. Overall, I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mike in Texas

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable, comfy
customer_reviews.text: It is a product of high quality, color and design, very comfortable, comfy, very practical, have good size I recommend buying and prices are good amazon
customer_reviews.author: Juan C. Ramos M

customer_reviews.title: Really sharp looking and comfortable. The subtle almost camo-like pattern makes this shoe ...
customer_reviews.text: Really sharp looking and comfortable. The subtle almost camo-like pattern makes this shoe a looker. I've been using it predominantly for walking, lifting and elliptical at the gym. Zero complaints so far. Runs a tad small. I take 12M for my sneakers, could have done 12.5 with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Manylander

customer_reviews.title: but I had to go up one whole size for them to fit comfortably. Now that I found the right size they ...
customer_reviews.text: Most have said go half size bigger, but I had to go up one whole size for them to fit comfortably. Now that I found the right size they are awesome. They mold to your feet, they are super light, and when you run you can feel them cushioning the impact. I just ordered my 3rd pair;)
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Stay away, don't wast your time.
customer_reviews.text: Originally I wrote that this shoes were comfortable and light, they still are but today I wore them for maybe the 10th time, they still look new. but the sole on the left shoe by the heel has now started to separate. This is very annoying and will basically make these unwearable. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Gruver

customer_reviews.title: These are great, but they run a little smaller than most ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great, but they run a little smaller than most other adidas shoes. I had the earlier pair of these that fit me so good, the new ones touch the tip of my toes at the same size. Besides that, awesome shoe. Light, air gets in really well. Feels like you're not even wearing shows.
customer_reviews.author: Xavier Skywalker

customer_reviews.title: Size runs a little small, but so far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes run a little small, but that has been my previous experience with Adidas shoes as well. I typically wear a 10 1/2 US, so I ordered these in an 11, and they fit well. The shoe is lightweight and looks great. Amazon had them at a great price as well.
customer_reviews.author: TheHT99sky

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: The sole of this shoe detached after a few uses. This product is cheap.
customer_reviews.author: C Young

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Items received as advertised and in a very timely manner. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Huey44

customer_reviews.title: Sending these back and got a pair of New Balance where I can get the wide shoe and have the better foot support
customer_reviews.text: I didn't take into account that these shoes are not wide. I would need a size bigger than normal for them to fit. That being said, I didn't sense the support I get from New Balance. Sending these back and got a pair of New Balance where I can get the wide shoe and have the better foot support.
customer_reviews.author: James L. Stull

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Our youngest son loves these. He runs 8-10 miles per week
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: GOOD RUNNING SHOE, MAYBE SIZE UP 1/2 SIZE...
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is very comfy, fits goods, just a little narrow and tight. Should stretch out the more I wear them. Ran with them a few times so far and feel good. Would recommend but maybe size up 1/2 size. I wear a 12, would have gotten a 12 1/2, but Amazon was out. Still fits, just a little snug.
customer_reviews.author: CORY MCNUTT

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, but pretty humdrum
customer_reviews.text: So much for trying to save a few bucks. I have an elusive concept that shoes feel "alive" for me or not, which can vary from shoe to shoe. These seem to lack that feeling. These have an ordinary middle-of-the-pack sponginess and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Philo

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: The sneaker fits perfectly and the color is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: Because these are mesh sides my wide feet are comfortable in these and I can wear them all day ...
customer_reviews.text: I have rather wide feet. Because these are mesh sides my wide feet are comfortable in these and I can wear them all day and I wear these casually (not working out). The other shoes I can wear and work-out in are newbalance 840-v2 which are about 3x more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: theDyker

customer_reviews.title: the 11-1/2 fit great. I wear these for walking/running the dog
customer_reviews.text: my foot is 11-wide, and I usually order a half size larger...the 11-1/2 fit great. I wear these for walking/running the dog, and I recently wore them on an all day fishing trip, where I was standing up a lot...they're very comfortable and durable.
customer_reviews.author: bjjjcr

customer_reviews.title: Got them a couple of days ago - perfect fit, love them
customer_reviews.text: All my sport shoes are size 10, but this ones are too small. Returned them and ordered size 10.5. Got them a couple of days ago - perfect fit, love them. Used them already for my 3 miles morning run. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: adrian1977

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoes, fit is very narrow
customer_reviews.text: I love Adidas shoes, only gym / running shoes I buy. I ordered these off Amazon as finding Adidas running shoes can be difficult and I thought I'd save the time. These are nice, light, firm, but, they are very narrow, I do typically wear a wide shoe, but these I have to leave the laces very open in order to wear comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Curt R.

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Really good looking shoe, but too small. Be sure to order at least a 1/2 to 1 size bigger. I wear a 10 normally. I should have got an 11 on this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: widstyles

customer_reviews.title: Been super gluing ever since
customer_reviews.text: Glue on bottom of shoe started coming off after a couple of weeks. Been super gluing ever since. I guess you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Charles A.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pair of shoes for the price. A little bit weak in the rear area. I've been using this for indoor workout like running, spinning, etc with no problem and great confort,
customer_reviews.author: Raul Arias

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best shoe ever. These are so comfortable and lightweight. Just started running again this spring, finally found a shoe that works for me. I have Hallux Rigidus in my big toe which is painful when wearing most shoes. These have a wider toe box than many shoes, which really helps.
customer_reviews.author: M Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: ADIDAS FOR OVER 50 YRS. NONE COMPARE AND NIKE IS A JOKE
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the most comfortable shoe I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the most comfortable shoe I've ever owned! (36yrs) This is my second pair as the first one's sole/skin started to peel off; I should have just glued it back on but opted for another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Patterson

customer_reviews.title: really like. Love the color
customer_reviews.text: really like. Love the color. Course when it's cold outside, you might want something with a little more insulation But other than that, they're really nice shoes. Flexible lightweight comfy as can be.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Scott

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, great looking and ready to run
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, great looking and ready to run, walk or dance. Thanks Adidas.
customer_reviews.author: Cristobal Rivero

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, is comfortable. Questionable quality
customer_reviews.text: The rubber parts that grip the ground start coming off after just a few days use.
customer_reviews.author: BHad_pueblo19

customer_reviews.title: Feels and looks great.
customer_reviews.text: If you are buying it for running, buy one size more than your regular shoes, this model can feel somewhat small. I have seen similar comments about this, for the rest it is a great value for what you pay if you are a non-professional runner. In addition to running I have used them in International overseas flights and the feel really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Lobo

customer_reviews.title: Rubber Sole Peeled off
customer_reviews.text: First pair of shoes I ever owned that actually broke! The blue rubber on the bottom has all peeled off in only a month of light use. I only use them occasionally for light walks around the neighborhood. Nothing too rigorous.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Davis

customer_reviews.title: Initial quality and comfort is there, but these aren't lasting.
customer_reviews.text: I wear them a few times a week. I was initially very happy, but they are starting to fall apart. I've been an Adidas guy forever but these shoes may change that. Rubber is beginning to peel from the sole of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Keath L Flohr

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Only wore them a few times and the soles came off, crzy glued them back the parts that I didn't lose.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great all around sport shoe !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for an all around sport shoe. Adidas is the only brand that fits my foot properly. There is no foam arch support on the innersole, which can be added. Other than that the shoes are light and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: VegasGolf G

customer_reviews.title: The bottom sole-blue-rubber came lose... after a ...
customer_reviews.text: The bottom sole-blue-rubber came lose ... after a few weeks ... I have to buy rubber glue or I will be making "flapping" noises every time that I run ...
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Hernandez Serrano

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Powerblaze is my new favorite. Lightweight and comfortable. I ordered 5 pairs in different colors. If you like the fit of Adidas (as I do), you will like this sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: T. Devine

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered these looking for a good paid of shoes to wear all day being on his feet. He absolutely swears by these shoes! He says that they are supportive in the arch, springy in the heel, and light. They are very durable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian I.

customer_reviews.title: good for
customer_reviews.text: Not wide enough for me , to be used only on warm weather, dry surface,dustless area , good for indoor
customer_reviews.author: G H

customer_reviews.title: super Comfortable, Light weight And Airy
customer_reviews.text: super Comfortable, Light weight And Airy. I Tend Bar And These Shoes Are Great When You're On Your Feet Eight Plus HOurs A Night And Moving.
customer_reviews.author: damon ward

customer_reviews.title: tennis shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes. I have been looking for a solid grey pair that I would be happy with and feels good on my feet. I orcwd'sse6zeeder from Amazon's subsidiary companies and I am always pleased. They are just as described.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Marie Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and fit as expected. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Late_to_the_Party

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband. He wears them all the time. They are true to size, comfortable and durable. He uses them for casual as well as exercise. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: I originally ordered my size, size 9 but cancelled ...
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered my size, size 9 but cancelled my order after reading the reviews recommending that I should order a half size larger. I re ordered a size 9 1/2 and they are the 1/2 size too long. I should have gone with the size 9 but these will work for as much referee work that I do. The seam started to split after only 2 months. Amazon only offers a one month return policy. Only recourse is to contact Adidas directly. Wish me luck!! I can't recommend this shoe
customer_reviews.author: John Tully

customer_reviews.title: He really liked them and thought they were pretty comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I got these on sale for my son. He really liked them and thought they were pretty comfortable. They held up well, normally he goes through shoes pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, stylish and relatively inexpensive compared to the competition
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, stylish and relatively inexpensive compared to the competition. What else would you expect from Adidas?? It's the total package that has made me an Adidas man for life!
customer_reviews.author: alexjb

customer_reviews.title: like cloth. Did not like them as a design
customer_reviews.text: upper material felt very soft, flexible, like cloth. Did not like them as a design, but can not comment on quality as i did not wear them, just tried them on to see if fit my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Lubo

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Needed a pair of shoes to wear when I'm on duty. These are comfortable and cheap. Would still go with Shox but in my size you have to have those customized since I went the cheaper route.
customer_reviews.author: B. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and prompt delivery
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit like every other pair of Adidas I have purchased. I always get a size 10. Great shoe for working out and exercising.
customer_reviews.author: Hermon McCain

customer_reviews.title: Got them a half size bigger than usual like a lot of other reviews have suggested and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Got them a half size bigger than usual like a lot of other reviews have suggested and it made a huge difference. My feet and toes are much more comfortable when running. I like these shoes a lot and I do recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe just buy a half size up
customer_reviews.text: I like this shoes, I expect them to be more cushioned, I am 9.5 in merrell and if I would buy size 10 it would be perfect. I still can wear them just don't have enough room for my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Alberto

customer_reviews.title: One foot in front of another
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son, who has foot problems. He had a foot accident when he was a teen and had surgery. These shoes are a nice fit and seem to relieve his discomfort. Great improvement for him
customer_reviews.author: Altapi

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I'm a distance runner, and I have trouble finding Adidas running shoes in my local stores. These shoes are great. They have the heel cushioning I prefer. They also fit perfectly. By the way, "solar red" is actually bright orange, if that matters to you.
customer_reviews.author: RLS33

customer_reviews.title: an they proved to be a good over time walking
customer_reviews.text: I waited until the 4th of July to wear these at an all day outing to see how they would actually perform, an they proved to be a good over time walking shoe
customer_reviews.author: R.W. Ezell

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoes - Gotta Workout!
customer_reviews.text: Did 4.5 miles on the dreadmill the day they arrived and they fit well. No blisters and no sore feet. Now it is time to get back to doing some real distance!
customer_reviews.author: P. E. Raney

customer_reviews.title: Won't buy again
customer_reviews.text: Not durable. Both the right and left foot are falling apart. I don't run in these shoes, I walk in them. They're falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works for me good value for the cost fits n looks good
customer_reviews.author: gnirad

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, look great
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, look great. Boyfriend has size 8 feet on every other pair of shoes he has ever owned, but these crimp his toes a bit. Still, he takes them out running and hiking and loves them.
customer_reviews.author: KaityKat

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoe. I have had these for two years now and they have barely worn.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome shoes, excellent quality, very comfortable, buy half size bigger because this model is a little small
customer_reviews.author: Marco A. Linares

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe model feels 'squishier' than average. I like that.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Jones

customer_reviews.title: These things feel like I am walking on air
customer_reviews.text: These things feel like I am walking on air, they are super light and as a 12hr shift nurse, my feet are not screaming at the end when I wear them
customer_reviews.author: Norman Swope

customer_reviews.title: Shoes very comfortable and breathable
customer_reviews.text: Shoes very comfortable and breathable. However in first week of use about 1.5" of material pulled off of the sole right by big toe. I'm a nurse and only work part time. Other than that issue they're great, but hard for me to recommend a shoe that expensive with this "blemish" after such a short time.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe for the money. Fits well, and is pretty comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron D

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The worst purchase I have made the second time I wear the shoes and they break, poor quality I do not recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Williams

product_meta.title: adidas Mens Powerblaze m-M Powerblaze M-m
product_meta.description: Adidas Men's Powerblaze Shoes are comfortable, sporty and great for running. It features an ADIWEAR outsole for the best durability in high wear areas. Product Features: Lace-up front Performance running shoes Upper techfit holds foot in place while wicking away sweat Maximum ventilation with high-performance lining ADIPRENE+ for maximum cushioning and durability ADIWEAR outsole for high durability SPRINTWEB midlayer
feature_bullets: Keep your run flowing in the power blaze featuring full-length adiprene+ cushioning with a sprint web midlayer and tech-fit upper and a look inspired by the revolutionary spring blade runner
Full length adiprene+ for optimized cushioning and rebounding
Adiwear outsole for best durability in high wear areas
